nfrs.name: Resilience
nfrs.description: Ability to withstand and recover from failures.

nfrs.name: Real-time Processing
nfrs.description: Processes data as it arrives, immediately.

nfrs.name: Low Complexity
nfrs.description: Easy to understand, develop, and maintain.

nfrs.name: Auditability
nfrs.description: Ability to trace all actions and data changes.

nfrs.name: Analytics Capability
nfrs.description: Supports complex business intelligence and queries.

nfrs.name: BI Reporting
nfrs.description: Optimized for business intelligence dashboards and reports.

nfrs.name: Domain-Driven
nfrs.description: Architecture is organized around business domains.

nfrs.name: Extreme Scalability
nfrs.description: Handles massive, elastic loads, often by avoiding a central DB.

constraints.name: Low Cost
constraints.description: Prioritizes minimizing operational and development costs.

constraints.name: Small Team
constraints.description: Suitable for a small number of developers.

constraints.name: Cloud Native
constraints.description: Assumes deployment on modern cloud infrastructure.

constraints.name: Pay-per-use
constraints.description: Cost model is based on actual usage, not provisioning.

constraints.name: Decentralized Team
constraints.description: Suitable for globally distributed or autonomous teams.

domains.name: E-Commerce
domains.description: Online sales, product catalogs, and checkouts.

domains.name: IoT
domains.description: High-volume ingestion of time-series data from devices.

domains.name: FinTech
domains.description: Financial services, payments, and high-security transactions.

domains.name: Analytics Platform
domains.description: Focus on data processing, reporting, and ML.
